law.text: Contestants in a boxing, kickboxing, or mixed martial arts show or exhibition shall be examined by a reputable licensed physician appointed by the authority, and shall meet the health and fitness requirements as established in administrative regulations promulgated by the authority before participating in a boxing, kickboxing, or mixed martial arts bout or exhibition.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 10, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 20, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 106, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 5, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 18.
